> There is a huge amount of info on this message board though.. It 
took me a week to read through almost everything and a lot of stuff is 
 really interesting. I havent been posting much since I am waiting 
for the sourceforge boys to do more characters, spells and maybe  
something like LAN play. I keep up though. Just my thoughts.

Well, I can get the message archives saved within 16-17 large files.

Aside from working on user friendliness and making the program more 
crash proof against bad input, there's not much I can work on right 
now with my random scenario generator.  I'm hoping to get a version I 
feel fairly comfortable with ready and compile that version pretty 
soon.
